languages.text: "Казнь. Я сам себе палач, а город ксеносов станет моим орудием. Буду убивать столько отродий и их человеческих слуг, сколько смогу, а потом отправлюсь к Императору на последний суд".

"Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."
languages.original_text: "Казнь. Я сам себе палач, а город ксеносов станет моим орудием. Буду убивать столько отродий и их человеческих слуг, сколько смогу, а потом отправлюсь к Императору на последний суд".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

[draft] "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

[draft] "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

"Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

"Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

languages.text: 「死刑だ。俺は自分自身の死刑執行人であり、異種族の都市は処刑のための道具となる。奴らの落とし子どもと、その人間の手先をできる限り多く殺す。その後皇帝陛下のもとへ赴き、最後の裁きを受けるつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

traits.locale_text: 「死刑だ。俺は自分自身の死刑執行人であり、異種族の都市は処刑のための道具となる。奴らの落とし子どもと、その人間の手先をできる限り多く殺す。その後皇帝陛下のもとへ赴き、最後の裁きを受けるつもりだ」

languages.text: "Hinrichtung. Ich werde mein eigener Henker sein und die Stadt der Xenos mein Werkzeug. Ich werde so viele dieser Brut und ihrer menschlichen Diener töten wie möglich und dann zum Imperator gehen, um meinen letzten Richtspruch zu hören."
languages.original_text: "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Hinrichtung. Ich werde mein eigener Henker sein und die Stadt der Xenos mein Werkzeug. Ich werde so viele dieser Brut und ihrer menschlichen Diener töten wie möglich und dann zum Imperator gehen, um meinen letzten Richtspruch zu hören."

languages.text: « L'exécution. Je serai mon propre bourreau, et cette ville xénos sera son arme. Je tuerai autant de ces engeances que possible, sans épargner leurs serviteurs humains, puis je me présenterai à l'Empereur pour qu'Il rende mon jugement. »
languages.original_text: "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

traits.locale_text: « L'exécution. Je serai mon propre bourreau, et cette ville xénos sera son arme. Je tuerai autant de ces engeances que possible, sans épargner leurs serviteurs humains, puis je me présenterai à l'Empereur pour qu'Il rende mon jugement. »

languages.text: «Ejecución. Soy mi propio verdugo, y la ciudad de los xenos mi herramienta. Mataré a todos los engendros que pueda, y a sus siervos humanos también, y luego compareceré ante el Emperador para someterme a mi juicio final».
languages.original_text: "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

traits.locale_text: «Ejecución. Soy mi propio verdugo, y la ciudad de los xenos mi herramienta. Mataré a todos los engendros que pueda, y a sus siervos humanos también, y luego compareceré ante el Emperador para someterme a mi juicio final».

languages.text: “死刑。我负责执行我自己的死刑，而这座异形之城就是我的刑具。我会尽我所能，尽可能地杀掉那些异形和他们的人类仆人，之后我会来到帝皇面前，接受最后的审判。”
languages.original_text: "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

traits.locale_text: “死刑。我负责执行我自己的死刑，而这座异形之城就是我的刑具。我会尽我所能，尽可能地杀掉那些异形和他们的人类仆人，之后我会来到帝皇面前，接受最后的审判。”

languages.text: "İdam. Celladım ben, zenoların şehri de aracım... Öldürebildiğim kadar yaratığı ve onların insan hizmetkârlarını öldüreceğim. Sonra da nihai yargım için İmparator'un huzuruna çıkacağım."
languages.original_text: "Execution. I am my own executioner, and the city of the xenos will be my tool. I will kill as many of the spawn and their human servants as I can, and then I will go to the Emperor for my final judgement."

traits.locale_text: "İdam. Celladım ben, zenoların şehri de aracım... Öldürebildiğim kadar yaratığı ve onların insan hizmetkârlarını öldüreceğim, sonra da nihai yargım için İmparator'un huzuruna çıkacağım."
